definition[0]: the things that a company owns, that can be sold to pay debts

example[1]: a corporation with $9 billion in assets
definition[1]: something or someone that is useful because they help you succeed or deal with problems
example[2]: A sense of humor is a great asset in this business.
example[3]: I think Rachel would be an asset to the department.
definition[2]: something belonging to an individual or a business that has value or the power to earn money
example[4]: The company has a tremendous asset - 50 hectares of real estate right next to an international airport.
